title: I'm new to the pixel 4...where's the notification blink light ?
content:
Pixel 4xl , does this device have NO notification blinking light?  You  Google folks got to be kidding me ? 
One of you brilliant technicians , get a update for this . 
After 7 BlackBerrys ( that all had the light) ..it's quite the change !  Maybe call BlackBerry to figure that out .
Michael Shackleton.
